title: ttfAutohint - Some advice from user would be useful.
content: I've seen some type designer used ttfAutohint [http://www.freetype.org/ttfautohint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417064210/http:/www.freetype.org/ttfautohint/ "http://www.freetype.org/ttfautohint/"). For those who have tried it, can you give us your comments. Also, It seems possible to installed it on MAC OSX, however after a few inconclusive tests, I failed. Your help would be useful to help me to installed it. Thanks!
author: sim

comments.content:
